english_translation: Do not flutter/struggle searching and searching, saying the source of charm is not found;
Does the boat move in the ocean of discomfort?

kannada_original: ಚಪಲ ಚಂಚಲ ನೆಲದಿ ನಲಿವು ಬಲು ಕನಲುವುದು;
english_transliteration: Capala cañcala neladi nalivu balu kanaluvudu;
english_translation: Joy burns intensely in an impulsive, restless place;

kannada_original: ಕಳೆ ಬೆಳೆದು ಬರಿ ಅಳಲು – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: kaḷe beḷedu bari aḷalu – Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: Weeds grow, resulting only in sorrow – Muddu Rāma.
